ione.host: Opennebula RPC2 (xmlrpc) endpoint. By default it is http://opennebula_IP:2633/RPC2
ione.user: Opennebula admin username. By default it is oneadmin, but you may create new user with admin privilege
ione.group: Grop for new VMs and users. By default it is 1
ione.sched: Opennebula host scheduler rules. For example:{"default": "ID="2""} - all VMs will be placed on host ID=2.{"default": "ID="2" | ID="13""}- the host will be chosen between 2 and 13 according to the scheduler opennebula policy. Read more: https://docs.opennebula.io/6.4/installation_and_configuration/opennebula_services/scheduler.html
ione.sched_ds: Opennebula datastore scheduler rules. For example:{"nvme": "ID="10"""ssd": "ID="11"""hdd": "ID="12"""sata": "ID="13""}- the datastore will be chosen between 10-13 according to the one selected when ordering in the application. Read more: https://docs.opennebula.io/6.4/installation_and_configuration/opennebula_services/scheduler.html
